About QiTASC

Helping you achieve your testing goals and improving time-to-market with INTACT is our top priority. Our automation tools are inspired by our philosophy that places an emphasis on high-quality, practical testing solutions that show immediate results.

Our Philosophy

High Quality

INTACT supports testers in their work, just like a vacuum cleaner facilitates housework

Solution-Oriented Approaches

Our team of experts provides a solution that is tailored to your specific automated testing needs.

Immediate Results

Discover the immediate difference that INTACT makes to your project's quality when you start testing with us.

Versatile, Customizable, Straightforward

Despite its many features, INTACT is easy to use, adaptable, and supports cooperation within and across departments.
